description: Complete end-to-end test of the /create-workorder command workflow to ensure all 10 steps execute correctly, paths are correct, artifacts are created, and feedback is provided properly throughout the process.
goal: Verify the entire /create-workorder workflow executes correctly from context gathering through plan creation, validation, and git commit with proper feedback at each step.
requirements: Provide clear feedback at each step
constraints: Must show skip feedback for foundation docs
Must commit to git at end
